description: A childhood friend of Yuri`s and is also a friend to Estelle. He joined the Imperial Knights at the same time as Yuri when they were younger for the purpose of making a difference in the world, but unlike Yuri, he stuck with it and since has continued to rise in the ranks, becoming the youngest to achieve the rank of "Captain". He often helps the party deal with problems across the land.
name: Flynn Scifo
